page.title: 20Local opinions
page.content: A recent survey of the population showed that on the whole most people were quite happy to live in this area. However,they had a few complaints as follows:- a)that not enough was being done to improve recreational facilities. b)that the bus service was very inadequate for the needs of old people and teenagers. c)that the postal service is very poor. d)that while the school provided a high standard of education the recent cuts in spending had adversely affected our school facilities and staffing. e)that the flow of traffic in the village was too intense for such a narrow road. MOST PEOPLE SAID THAT, GIVEN THE CHOICE,THEY WOULD NOT LIVE ELSEWHERE.
